clinical_study.brief_title: Assessment of Pubertal Growth Spurt in Growing Girls Using Middle Phalynx Finger and Correlate With Mandibular Second Molar
clinical_study.official_title: Assessment of Pubertal Growth Spurt in Growing Egyptian Females Using Modified Middle Phalanx of The Middle Finger Stages and Its Correlation With Development Stage of Mandibular Second Molar in Al Sharkia Governorate

brief_summary.textblock: Assessment of Pubertal Growth Spurt in Growing Egyptian Females Using Modified Middle Phalanx of The Middle Finger Stages and Its Correlation With Development Stage of Mandibular Second Molar

detailed_description.textblock:
The sample will be selected randomly from different schools in the government.
- Digital periapical radiograph for the middle finger for each participants will be taken using Digital x-ray portable machine.
- Radiographical images will be stored in a digital sensor to be transferred to computer then we asses growth spurt in girls and correlate it with devlopemt stage of mandibular second molar

primary_outcome.measure: Assessment of the time of pubertal growth spurt in growing Egyptian
primary_outcome.description: Taking xray of middle phalynx finger and then asses age of growth spurt through stages of middle phalynx finger

secondary_outcome.measure: females. Assessment the correlation between the modified middle phalanx of the middle finger and development stage of mandibular second molar
secondary_outcome.description: By taking xray mandibular second molar then make correlation between stages of both to estimate age for pubertal growth spurt for females

study_pop.textblock: Egyptian females between 9-14 years old to be sure that they are within or around the circumpubertal period.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Egyptian citizen
Exclusion Criteria:
- Systemic disease and syndromes
- Severe crowding
